name: Ext_R2_AuditEvent_pa_network
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.AuditEvent.participant.network for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents AuditEvent.participant.network from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AuditEvent|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Logical network location for application activity
element.definition: Logical network location for application activity, if the activity has a network location.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.agent.network` maps to R5 `AuditEvent.agent.network[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Identifier for the network access point of the user device
element.definition: An identifier for the network access point of the user device for the audit event.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.agent.network` maps to R5 `AuditEvent.agent.network[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Identifier for the network access point of the user device
element.definition: An identifier for the network access point of the user device for the audit event.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.agent.network` maps to R5 `AuditEvent.agent.network[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The type of network access point
element.definition: An identifier for the type of network access point that originated the audit event.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.agent.network` maps to R5 `AuditEvent.agent.network[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The type of network access point
element.definition: An identifier for the type of network access point that originated the audit event.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.agent.network` maps to R5 `AuditEvent.agent.network[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The type of network access point of this participant in the audit event
